extendedInfo.description: Hero, the World is counting on you !The Hero woke up and discovered that the Evil is coming from the underworld known as Anargor to destroy the World. Suddenly, he is pulled into this epic story, straight from his peaceful life. Chosen by the Gods, the Hero is on the way to stop the madness. IN GAME EXPERIENCE*** Fantastic 3D RPG*** Free to play*** Powered by Unity3D engine*** Travel through the realistic world with magnificent  graphics and sound set in the medieval times.*** Enjoy the real time melee combat face to face.*** 9 massive and detailed levels free to play (and more to follow soon) as RPG.*** Try to complete quests and missions  in order to save the World.*** Over 14 amazing enemy types (wolves, skeletons, orks, spiders ...) in game, each with their own  unique attacks and strategies.*** Range of equipment (more than 50)  will help you to go through the troubles.*** Stimulating background music and great sound effects.*** Astounding visual effects like fireballs, freezing, thunderbolt, storm  and more make your playing and magical attacks stunning to see.*** Options to control camera and customize to bird or  fight mode view. MANY OPTIONS AVAILABLE TO PROGRESS *** Collect gold coins after beating the enemies.*** Customize your Hero with a range of new weapons, armors or shields in game using collected or purchased coins.*** Use special magic and spells to defeat enemy or increase you health or strength.*** Buy health and mana bottles to increase you vitality and astral points. *** Save and load game whenever you want.*** Detailed mini maps will help you to find your way around and to solve the quest.*** Gain experience points with each completed quest and unlock new features as you level up.* Compatible with Android 2.3.3 and higher. Requirements:Please keep in mind that Anargor game is recommended for dual and quad core devices only. The game in not available for single-core CPU users, sorry about that.   Visit Anargor page â http://www.anargor.com  Like us on  http://www.facebook.com/pages/Anargor/219225391530002

reviews.title: Needs spit and polish...
reviews.comment: ...and a lot more work.  I agree with others that the controls need some major tweaking, and it is designed to make you part with your money.  No over-time HP recovery, etc.  IAP should enhance game play, not be mandatory.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Seriously?
reviews.comment: Health does not regenerate, therefore you have to buy potions to restore health and mana. Coin drop rate vs potions needed not feasible without buying coins with real $. Intolerable by design.
reviews.author: Larry Hanks

reviews.title: Worst RPG on Android
reviews.comment: And that\'s a family with some real stinkers. This feels like a student project from early last decade. Level design is ugly, linear, simpleminded, and glitchy. Awful user interface with an unreadable gothic font chaser, terrible camera control constantly obscured by foreground foliage, arduous and apparently pointless archery, and instead of health/mana regeneration you pay in realtime for potions which you then have to \"equip\" (sigh). Gear is bought via a store which you apparently carry in your pocket, and no selling.
reviews.author: Ryan Smith-Roberts

reviews.title: Just flat out lame
reviews.comment: I give 2 stars just cause it could of been a OK game if you could regenerate and at least go back n fourth levels to even grind for money to heal and weapons... Just don\'t waste our time or money... Could have a better hit look to it... Ah just don\'t worry about this game
reviews.author: Chris Ten

reviews.title: I couldn\'t get into it.
reviews.comment: Controls are ok, graphics ok, game is not designed the way I\'m used to. Mana/health doesn\'t regen, where\'s my inventory?? Game uninstalled.
reviews.author: Massimiliano Cacciamani
